name: SFMC Journey Builder
description:
[english]

Use this file to create mockups of your Journeys from Salesforce Marketing Cloud Journey Builder.


I've been working with JB for a while and it's been hard to produce email flows for my clients, and I couldn't find anything similar on the web, so decided to step in and do it myself. It includes almost all the activities present in SFMC JB as of today.


You can break the connectors to edit the nodes and make more complex connections between elements.
